text: Mount Sterling is an unincorporated community in Jefferson Township, Switzerland County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== A post office was established at Mount Sterling in 1819, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1907. ==Geography== Mount Sterling is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Switzerland County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Mount Sterling, Indiana
